night_mode_text: Lower intensity in the selected time period.
hourglass_text: Set period in witch hourglass effect will be performed. This function prolongs the lifetime of the Nixie tubes
permissionText: This app needs bluetooth and location access to search and connect to your device.
updateText: To use the available functions update your firmware version from FW {} to FW {}
legacyFwText1: 1. Unplug your device from the outlet
legacyFwText2: 2. Plug it back in while holding the MENU button
legacyFwText3: 3. Search for devices in the app
legacyFwText4: 4. Click the device with the yellow background and wait
